title: What can you get from majoring in philosophy in University? - Quora
tags: Advice About College and University Majors

response.answer_text: A fit mind. A mind that appreciates subtlety and discerns the truth; a mind that is inquisitive and adaptable and can solve problems. What you will get is a mind that will suit any future endeavor.
You should get a deeper understanding and appreciation of the history of philosophy, how academic philosophy is done, and some current topics. What did you expect?
